title: Foul Creation (1U44)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Exert an Elf to reveal an opponent's hand. You may discard a [Isengard] minion revealed to draw 2 cards.
Lore:	Saruman's Uruk-hai mirrored the singular focus of their master, viewing with contempt and disgust all they encountered.
Rarity:	U
